oai_dc:dc.dc:title: SEA BOTTOM TOPOGRAPHY WITH IMAGING RADAR
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vogelzang, J.
Wensink, G.J.
van Halsema, D.
van der Burg, G.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: imaging radar
bottom topography
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mapping sea bottom topography with imaging radars or optical sensors can add valuable information to traditional bathymetric surveys. This paper describes a series of (already performed or planned) experiments in which the Dutch Bottom Topography Group is involved. It is shown how radar and optical imagery can be used to map the sea floor.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 22 (1990): Proceedings of 22nd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Delft, The Netherlands, 1990.
